dt-example.title: Left and right fixed columns
dt-example.info: FixedColumns allows columns to be fixed from both the left and the right hand sides of the table. Fixing right hand-side columns is done by using the `fc-init fixedColumns.rightColumns` initialisation parameter, which works just the same as `fc-init fixedColumns.leftColumns` does for the left side of the table. This example shows both the left and right columns being fixed in place.
